body.name: CASDON Morphy Richards Coffee Maker | Fillable Toy Coffee Maker for Children Aged 3+ | Includes Water Level Indicator & Dripping Water!
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 33 mins
features: FILLABLE COFFEE POT: This toy coffee maker looks just like the real thing. Little ones can even fill the chamber up with water (a.k.a coffee)!
HANDS ON EXPERIENCE: Fill the chamber up with water and watch as it filters through to the coffee pot. Once “brewed”, pour into the provided tea cups. Voila!
WATER LEVEL INDICATOR: Thanks to the clear water level indicator, little ones will know when it's time to create a fresh brew.
INCLUDES: Toy coffee maker with fillable chamber and water level indicator, coffee pot, two cups, saucers and spoons.
LIGHT TO CARRY: Weight (kg): 0.36, Length (cm): 19.5, Width (cm): 19.0, Height (cm): 18.5
body.description: "Budding baristas can create any warm brew they like with help from their Morphy Richards Coffee Maker! Whether topping up the tea party or showing off with Americano’s, it’s never been easier for little ones to get involved with tasks that are usually reserved for the grown-ups. This toy coffee maker looks just like the real thing and even has a fillable chamber to add to the barista-inspired experience. Your Little Cook has full freedom to fill up the chamber (safely, with water!) and watch as it filters into the coffee pot. Once brewed to perfection, the “coffee” can be poured into the two cups provided. While everyone has their own preferences when it comes to coffee, there’s just something about this maker that delivers the best tasting cuppas in town, time and time again! Don't knock it till you try it."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little toy for all ages
reviews.reviewText: My 4 and 6 year old both love this little coffee maker. They love that it's realistic and that you can use real water (also fun without the water)!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for a toddler whose parents love coffee. Water can “brew” through like a real pot and is just very fun for play time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My toddler loves our coffee machine, so we bought this play one for him. It was his favorite Christmas present, and he still carries the coffee pot everywhere! It’s a great size for a play kitchen and the fact you can put water in it is a bonus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kid loves it, but is lacking in one aspect
reviews.reviewText: So let me start by saying this thing is cute and my kids does enjoy using it! Water toy? HUGE plus for them!The only thing I would have liked (and my kid) is that the buttons on the toy clicked when pressed.It's just a solid piece that doesn't move in or anything when pushed.We both immediately tried to push the buttons on the toy and were a little disappointed when it didn't click or push in.Would have been nice to just add that extra layer to the toy. Not bad in any way, just more of a "would be nice".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable! Very realistic.
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old son loves this! It has held up well with a toddler and his 2 big brother's playing with it. Exactly what I'd hoped for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very small but neat
reviews.reviewText: At first I was disappointed how small it was but then to learn that actually add water and brews the water. Son loves it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: My son loves the idea of being able to make his own "coffee". The first one I ordered was missing the lid to the coffee pot. They did end up sending me a whole new item without returning the one with missing parts. Unfortunately the top to the coffee pot of the second one went missing anyways. The pieces were not meant to stay together well especially for smaller children who don't realize how rough they can be when handling items. We still make it work though and he still loves to use it and have his "coffee" with me in the mornings so I guess I can't really complain too much. But the plastic top to the coffee put could be a little more sturdy so it doesn't just go flopping off the pot at the slightest jerk of the item. I got it during a lightning deal though so I can't really complain too much. It was worth the $10 I paid for it even though a piece of it ended up falling apart rather quickly anyways.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun realistic toy for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: This is a super fun and realistic toy coffee pot that actually drips water like real coffee. My daughter enjoys this toy as a fun addition to her play kitchen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 3 year old loves uses this. She is always going around making people tea.
excelente producto y entrega en tiempo y forma
Es una monada. A mi hija le encanta jugar con ella

I bought this for my grandson as he always wants to help his dad when making coffee. Now he can brew his own at the same time and no worry getting burnt by the hot water. This one actually drips into a toy carafe then he can pour into the little cups that come with it. I think it would break easy as it’s only made of hard plastic but holding up so fat. It is a good item that goes with his play kitchen he like to play with while his parents work in their kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 21, 2020
reviews.reviewText: He loves it. Easy to clean and very realistic
